noun.name: truck
noun.discription: a large motor vehicle for transporting goods

object1.name: bicycle
object1.discription: in parallel with 'truck', is a two-wheeled, human-powered vehicle

object2.name: helicopter
object2.discription: in parallel with 'truck', is a rotorcraft capable of vertical takeoff and landing

object3.name: submarine
object3.discription: in parallel with 'truck', is a watercraft capable of independent operation underwater

object4.name: train
object4.discription: in parallel with 'truck', is a series of connected vehicles that run on a track and transport passengers or freight

object5.name: motorcycle
object5.discription: in parallel with 'truck', is a two-wheeled motor vehicle

object6.name: airplane
object6.discription: in parallel with 'truck', is a powered flying vehicle with fixed wings and a weight greater than that of the air it displaces

object7.name: scooter
object7.discription: in parallel with 'truck', is a small, motorized or kick-powered vehicle with a platform for the rider's feet

object8.name: yacht
object8.discription: in parallel with 'truck', is a recreational boat or ship
